title: Original Design Gangsta
content:
This is totally worth the 2 minutes 38 seconds it takes to watch, cuz it’s funny as crap.  
 [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yJexyQT0l1c&NR=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035125/http:/www.youtube.com/watch?v=yJexyQT0l1c&NR=1 "http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yJexyQT0l1c&NR=1")

 [‹ Fellow type philosophers lend me your ears](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035125/http:/typophile.com/node/36387 "Go to previous forum topic") [US Dalton Maag distributors??? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035125/http:/typophile.com/node/36243 "Go to next forum topic")
author: DanGayle

comments.content: Let’s try to save this kind of content for the blogs — thanks :)
Oh yeah, we have blogs now!

That was ridiculous.

Is surfstation still around? Their site hasn’t been updated in years.

Respect my dropshadows!

:^D

Great stuff, and it comes with undertitles, too. ;)

Thanks BigD for pointing that out!
Original Architecture Gangsta will drive a saab. So you better watch out!

Hilarious! Biddy had a link to this recently as well: [http://www.typophile.com/node/35941](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35941 "http://www.typophile.com/node/35941")
Nah... I think Biddy posted that during TypeCon, in early August. You were busy giving us [field reports](http://web.archive.org/web/20071021035125/http:/typophile.com/node/35598) back then. :-)
